description: Candidates give their views on how the States should help reduce Guernsey's environmental impact.
title: Guernsey Election 2020: Climate change
title_page: Guernsey Election 2020: Climate change - BBC News
maintext: Lucia Faith said: "We should be starting an education programme to make sure islanders really understand why this is important, what and how they can start making changes, and more importantly moving very quickly on to renewable energy for the island.
